issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
The Studio should work as IDE for Android Module Development.
Installation of Eclipse Java Development Tools is not possible. 

This warning/error comes.
 To: org.eclipse.platform.feature.group [4.4.2.v20150204-1700]
  Cannot satisfy dependency:
    From: Appcelerator Studio 4.8.1.201612050850-05122016085155 (com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product 4.8.1.201612050850-05122016085155)
    To: com.appcelerator.titanium.feature.360.rcp.feature.group [4.8.1.201612050850-8k9iFNRFT6e5O-XsWq7Uu7ESQDTs]
  Cannot satisfy dependency:
    From: Eclipse Java Development Tools 3.12.2.v20161124-1400 (org.eclipse.jdt.feature.group 3.12.2.v20161124-1400)
    To: org.eclipse.jdt.ui [3.12.2.v20160929-0804]
  Cannot satisfy dependency:
    From: Java Development Tools UI 3.12.2.v20160929-0804 (org.eclipse.jdt.ui 3.12.2.v20160929-0804)
    To: bundle org.eclipse.debug.core [3.10.0,4.0.0)
  Cannot satisfy dependency:
    From: Eclipse Platform 4.4.2.v20150204-1700 (org.eclipse.platform.feature.group 4.4.2.v20150204-1700)
    To: org.eclipse.debug.core [3.9.1.v20140805-1629]

comments.body: Hello, I can't verify your issue in studio 4.8.1. I Studio did install Eclipse JDT without any error. May be it's your connection issue.
